meanings.definition: A plant of the buttercup family with bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The field was filled with beautiful kingcups swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of kingcups to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used kingcups to decorate its tiny treehouse.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the valley like a field of kingcups in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The kingcups danced joyfully under the warm summer sun.

meanings.sent1: The artist used a vibrant kingcups hue to paint the sunset.
meanings.sent2: Her dress shimmered in a lovely shade of kingcups.
meanings.sent3: The taxi stood out in the sea of cars with its unique kingcups color.
meanings.sent4: The golden crown sparkled with a regal touch of kingcups.
meanings.sent5: The kingcups of the painting seemed to glow with their own light.
